attributes.action: Courts to continue to work longer hours
attributes.additional_details: Because of the riots the courts are working longer hours and sucessfully getting cases dealt with quickly. This should continue afterwards so that criminals c\an be dealt with more quickly. This would have many benefits.Criminals would have less time on remand,free up time in custody, court buildings made better use of,This should apply to crown courts as well as magistrates courts We would probably need more judges, magistrates and support staff.We should aim for instant justice..
